thread.title: Uber will deliver Patriots championship gear right to your door
thread.title_full: Uber will deliver Patriots championship gear right to your door

title: Uber will deliver Patriots championship gear right to your door
text:
If you’re scrambling to find the proper Patriots getup for the Tuesday duck boat parade celebrating the five-time New England Super Bowl champs, Uber will help you out.
From 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. Monday, the ride-sharing company says it is delivering official championship gear from Fanatics. Pats fans in Boston, Worcester, Providence, and Manchester can order up to 10 t-shirts and hats through the company’s app and get them delivered within minutes.
The first 100 fans to place an order will also get a limited edition Julian Edelman figurine, according to Uber.
